name: You Only Livez Twice
description:
It's after the zombie apocalypse and you want to survive at all costs. Do you have what it takes?

Play as both humans and zombies in this 2d survival game. Each has a different strategy for winning.

Play as Humans
Start with nothing and quickly find weapons to protect yourself. Just don't let yourself get close to a zombie horde.

Play as Zombies
Build a giant horde and overwhelm your opponents through sheer force.

Multiplayer
Play against 30 other people in realtime as you attempt to be the last person/thing standing.

Single player
Develop your skills against the computer to prepare yourself for the multiplayer onslaught.
